alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 7:05PM EST until January 12 at 7:30PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN EDGEFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN AIKEN COUNTIES... At 705 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edgefield County Airport to Graniteville to near Augusta, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Clearwater, Aiken Mall, Belvedere, New Ellenton, USC Aiken, Aiken Municipal Airport, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Edgefield County Airport, Graniteville, Burnettown, Trenton, Lick Fork Campground, Hopeland Gardens, Murphys Estates, Mt Vintage, Redcliffe Plantation State Historic Site and Boyd Pond Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 2 and 28. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EST for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
